meanings.definition: Subjected to the process of thermalization.
meanings.sent1: The thermalized metal felt warm to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The thermalized blanket kept me cozy on the cold night.
meanings.sent3: The thermalized cupcake was so hot, it melted the frosting!
meanings.sent4: The thermalized room was like a sauna, making everyone sweat.
meanings.sent5: The thermalized rock retained heat long after the sun had set.

meanings.sent1: The thermalized water in the pool was perfect for swimming.
meanings.sent2: The thermalized jacket kept him warm in the snowstorm.
meanings.sent3: The thermalized oven made the kitchen feel like a sauna.
meanings.sent4: The thermalized blanket was like a warm hug on a chilly evening.
meanings.sent5: The thermalized coffee stayed hot for hours in the insulated mug.

meanings.sent1: The thermalized glass was molded into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The thermalized metal was shaped into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The thermalized marshmallows were perfect for toasting over the fire.
meanings.sent4: The thermalized wax melted easily under the heat of the flame.
meanings.sent5: The thermalized plastic became pliable and easy to work with.
